rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
Boon {1}{W}{W} [i](Transform this permanent and attach it to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4 and has flying and vigilance.
When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, transform Conclave Conscription.
